SELECT * FROM hotels where id IN ( WITH AVAIID AS (SELECT id from hotels where city_id = #{cityId}) SELECT Q1.hotel_id FROM( SELECT rooms.hotel_id, MIN(price) cheapest_price FROM rooms JOIN categories ON rooms.category = categories.id WHERE rooms.hotel_id IN (select * from AVAIID) GROUP BY rooms.hotel_id ) Q1 JOIN ( SELECT hotel_id, AVG(stars) avg_stars FROM orders JOIN reviews ON orders.order_number = reviews.order_number WHERE hotel_id IN (select * from AVAIID) GROUP BY hotel_id ) Q2 on Q1.hotel_id = Q2.hotel_id ORDER BY avg_stars DESC, cheapest_price ASC )
